001
002package com.commercetools.compat;
003
004import java.net.URI;
005import java.time.Duration;
006import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.core.type.TypeReference;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JavaType;
010
011import io.sphere.sdk.client.SphereRequest;
012import io.vrap.rmf.base.client.*;
013
014public class CompatClient implements ApiHttpClient {
015    private final ApiHttpClient client;
016    private final String projectKey;
017
018    private CompatClient(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey) {
019        this.client = client;
020        this.projectKey = projectKey;
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public URI getBaseUri() {
025        return client.getBaseUri();
026    }
027
028    public static CompatClient of(final ApiHttpClient client, final String projectKey) {
029        return new CompatClient(client, projectKey);
030    }
031
032    public <O, TO> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(final SphereRequest<TO> request,
033            final Class<O> outputType) {
034        final CompatRequest<O> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, request, outputType);
035        return compatRequest.execute(client);
036    }
037
038    public <O, TO> ApiHttpResponse<O> executeBlocking(final SphereRequest<TO> request, final Class<O> outputType) {
039        final CompatRequest<O> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, request, outputType);
040        return compatRequest.executeBlocking(client);
041    }
042
043    public <O, TO> ApiHttpResponse<O> executeBlocking(final SphereRequest<TO> request, final Class<O> outputType,
044            Duration duration) {
045        final CompatRequest<O> compatRequest = CompatRequest.of(client, projectKey, request, outputType);
046        return compatRequest.executeBlocking(client, duration);
047    }
048
049    @Override
050    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, Class<O> outputType) {
051        return client.execute(request, outputType);
052    }
053
054    @Override
055    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, TypeReference<O> outputType) {
056        return client.execute(request, outputType);
057    }
058
059    @Override
060    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request, JavaType outputType) {
061        return client.execute(request, outputType);
062    }
063
064    @Override
065    public <O> CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<O>> execute(ClientRequestCommand<O> method) {
066        return method.execute(this);
067    }
068
069    @Override
070    public ResponseSerializer getSerializerService() {
071        return client.getSerializerService();
072    }
073
074    @Override
075    public CompletableFuture<ApiHttpResponse<byte[]>> execute(ApiHttpRequest request) {
076        return client.execute(request);
077    }
078
079    @Override
080    public void close() throws Exception {
081        client.close();
082    }
083}
